data.enText: a legal agreement by which a bank or similar organization lends you money to buy a house, etc., and you pay the money back over a particular number of years; the sum of money that you borrow
data.chText: 按揭（由银行等提供房产抵押借款）；按揭贷款

data.enText: to apply for/take out/pay off a mortgage
data.chText: 申请 / 取得 / 还清抵押贷款

data.enText: to give a bank, etc. the legal right to own your house, land, etc. if you do not pay the money back that you have borrowed from the bank to buy the house or land
He had to mortgage his house to pay his legal costs.
data.chText: 他不得不把房子抵押出去来付诉讼费。

means: 按揭(由银行等提供房产抵押借款)

tr: a conditional conveyance of property as security for the repayment of a loan
put up as security or collateral

example.tran: 房屋抵押贷款利率的提高

value.def: A mortgage is a loan of money which you get from a bank or building society in order to buy a house.

example.ex: They had to mortgage their home to pay the bills.
example.tran: 他们不得不抵押房屋借贷来支付这些款项。

value.def: If you mortgage your house or land, you use it as a guarantee to a company in order to borrow money from them.

partsOfSpeech.dec: en- 进入,使… + gage 承诺
